edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train
Class SymmetricalWordAlignment

java.lang.Object
  edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train.AbstractWordAlignment
      edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train.SymmetricalWordAlignment
All Implemented Interfaces:
WordAlignment
public class SymmetricalWordAlignment
extends AbstractWordAlignment

Sentence pair with symmetrical word alignment (i.e., if e_i aligns to f_j in one direction, then f_j aligns to e_i as well in the other direction). If this is not what you want, use GIZAWordAlignment.

Author:
Michel Galley
See Also:
WordAlignment, GIZAWordAlignment
